1.title: Wallet Friendly Wraps
1.plot: On the menu: turkey lettuce wraps, served with crisp veggies and soy-mustard sauce. Also: ginger-lemon oatmeal cookies.

2.title: Accessible Yet Exotic
2.plot: Coconut chicken curry with vegetables, served with coconut-scented rice and banana bread with chocolate chips.

3.title: Paradise by the Cooktop Light
3.plot: On the menu: meat loaf topped with mustard-and-sour-cream gravy; twice-baked mashed potatoes with green onions and cheddar; and braised collard greens with bacon, garlic and lemon zest.

4.title: Big Buffalo, Ten Bills
4.plot: Buffalo chicken drumsticks, smoky baked beans and s'more sundaes are served.

5.title: Keep the Change Chile
5.plot: Chile rellenos with homemade salsa, rice with green peppers and jalapeños, and mashed black beans are served.

6.title: Winter in Provence
6.plot: Daube a la Provençale, a classic French stew, is made, along with macaronade (macaroni gratin) and orange-olive-oil cake.

7.title: Greek-onomical Dining
7.plot: Greek moussaka and a salad with celery, grapefruit and olives are made.

8.title: A Down-Home Ten Dollar Dinner
8.plot: Chicken and biscuits, served alongside broccoli-and-cauliflower salad with homemade Dijon dressing.

9.title: Panini Pinching
9.plot: Melissa makes Cuban sandwiches, homemade garlic pickles, black-bean soup and angel food cake.

10.title: Pan-Asian Perfection
10.plot: Asian-marinated pork chops with a ginger-orange glaze; sesame-peanut noodles with scallions, bell peppers, cabbage and peanuts; cucumber-carrot salad with vinegar-chile dressing.

11.title: Open-Air Fare
11.plot: Philly cheese-steaks with three cheeses, crispy oven fries and caramel apples are made.

12.title: Scarpetta Swap Out
12.plot: Melissa makes budget-friendly versions of dishes found at Scott Conant's acclaimed New York restaurant, Scarpetta. Included: roasted sole with tomatoes, basil and oregano; chicken-liver ravioli with Marsala reduction.

13.title: Saving Coin with Catfish
13.plot: Pecan-crusted catfish with spicy cream sauce, corn succotash and lemon-tea cake are on the menu.

1.title: Perfectly Priced Parisian
1.plot: Recipes for a potato-bacon-Gruyere torte, a Paris café green salad and an applesauce granita with maple yogurt are provided in the premiere of this series.

2.title: Less Money, More Moroccan
2.plot: Meatballs braised in cumin-scented crushed tomatoes, couscous with dried dates and glazed carrots complete a North-African-inspired meal.

3.title: Bird on a Budget
3.plot: Chicken a l'orange is made, along with crispy potatoes and fennel-cabbage slaw.

4.title: Savory Savings
4.plot: Dishes include wild-salmon cakes; herb-flecked orzo; and roasted asparagus in lemon vinaigrette.

5.title: Beyond Pork and Beans
5.plot: Melissa prepares braised pork, drop biscuits with green onions and black beans.

6.title: Supper for a Song
6.plot: Lemony shrimp-scampi pasta, roasted broccoli with Parmesan, and coffee-spiked affogato complete an Italian meal.

1.title: Healthy Helpings
1.plot: Melissa prepares tuna Nicoise bread salad with white beans.

2.title: Penne for Pennies
2.plot: A nutritious meal, featuring pasta with sausage and roasted vegetables.

3.title: Marengo Tango
3.plot: Chicken Marengo, chunky mashed potatoes and spinach-citrus salad are prepared.

4.title: Sunday Supper
4.plot: Herb-crusted pork loin; braised red cabbage and popovers are prepared.

5.title: Football Fiesta
5.plot: Preparing game-day eats, including cheese quesadillas; black-bean hummus; tapenade with tuna; and seasoned popcorn.

6.title: Mortgage Free Meal
6.plot: On the menu: fish en papillote with rice and caramelized shallots; chocolate French toast.

7.title: Steak Dinner
7.plot: French-cut steak, served with potato cake and a winter-kale salad.

8.title: French Bistro Bargain
8.plot: Cassoulet with garlic breadcrumbs and blueberry-lemon crepes with custard sauce are served.

9.title: Hooked on Fish
9.plot: The menu includes fish-and-white-bean tostadas, topped with pineapple-avocado salsa.

10.title: Magical Meal
10.plot: Pot-roast carbonnade is made, along with boiled potatoes and café au lait pots de crème.

11.title: European Party
11.plot: Spanish tortillas, escarole salad with anchovy dressing and spicy butterscotch pudding.

1.title: Budget Banquet
1.plot: Pissalidiere, butter-lettuce salad with poached eggs and lardons, and honey-glazed grilled pineapple complete a French-inspired meal.

2.title: Italian 101
2.plot: An Italian meal, featuring Caprese tartlets, Parmesan-crusted pork-loin cutlets, and pasta sautéed in garlic oil with broccoli.

3.title: Payless Picnic
3.plot: A picnic is planned, including rosemary-chocolate-chip shortbread.

4.title: Shrimpy Spending
4.plot: On the menu: shrimp with cilantro pesto; lentil-quinoa salad; tomato-and-eggplant casserole.

5.title: Simply Summer
5.plot: A summery meal, featuring grilled chicken with roasted-tomato-and-onion dipping sauce and celery-root remoulade.

6.title: Flash in the Pan
6.plot: Prepared: sautéed flounder fillets, served with stuffed summer vegetables and fresh watermelon drizzled with ginger-mint simple syrup.

7.title: Pizza Al Fresco
7.plot: A trip to the farmers' market inspires recipes for grilled pizza with mushrooms and an antipasto platter with pickled and grilled seasonal vegetables.

8.title: Money Free Mediterranean
8.plot: A Mediterranean-inspired meal, featuring Catalan pan con tomate (bread with tomato); flat-roasted chicken; and a sweet-vegetable sauté.

9.title: Spicy Spendthrift
9.plot: Fish skewers with basil chimichurri are served with spicy grilled corn and a chocolate-and-mini-butter tartine.

10.title: Backyard BBQ
10.plot: Beef and black-bean sliders are made, along with grilled coleslaw and grilled-potato salad.

11.title: Bargain Brunch
11.plot: A brunch menu, featuring Dutch baby pancakes topped with fresh blueberries and lemon zest; homemade garlic-sausage patties; and roasted Provencal tomatoes.

12.title: Cooking for Company
12.plot: Prepared: roasted chicken, served with sautéed Swiss chard and petite Nutella pochettes.

13.title: Sweet Treats
13.plot: Melissa prepares warm steak-and-potato salad and apple cobbler with cardamom-caramel sauce.

14.title: Thanksgiving
14.plot: Turkey taquitos; cranberry salsa and baked sweet-potato empanadas are made.

15.title: $10 Holiday
15.plot: Affordable holiday entrées, including roast beef with Marsala gravy and pork roast stuffed with ham and cheese.

1.title: Frugal French
1.plot: French onion soup, homemade breadsticks and salade Nicoise are served.

2.title: Bellisimo Bargain
2.plot: Garlic spaghetti, sautéed cannellini beans on toasted baguette slices, and a quick cinnamon-apple tart complete an inexpensive Italian meal.

3.title: Restaurant Price Buster
3.plot: Braised country-style ribs are prepared, along with creamy polenta and roasted balsamic onions.

4.title: Ten Dollar Tailgate
4.plot: A tailgate menu, featuring barbecue-ranch deviled eggs; chili; and spiced kettle corn.

5.title: Melissa's 4-Step Fish
5.plot: Sautéed fish piccata, served with broccoli and angel-hair pasta. Also prepared: individual chocolate-sponge puddings.

6.title: Brunch for a Buck
6.plot: Huevos rancheros are served with cornbread and honey-lime butter.

7.title: Soup and Sandwich Savings
7.plot: Croque-madame sandwiches served with roasted-tomato soup and crispy kale chips.

8.title: Dixie on a Dime
8.plot: Fried chicken, buttermilk mashed potatoes and kale slaw complete a southern-inspired meal.

9.title: Low-Lira Lasagna
9.plot: Meat lasagna and Mandarin-orange gratin with sabayon sauce are made.

10.title: Chicken for Change
10.plot: Braised chicken in a creamy mustard sauce, buttered noodles and a leek salad with balsamic vinaigrette complete a French-inspired menu.

11.title: Cost-Cutting Comfort
11.plot: Chicken-pot-pie turnovers, served with thyme-scented radishes and carrots, and black-bean brownies.

12.title: Takeout Fakeout
12.plot: Prepared: sesame chicken with an orange marinade; lemony egg soup; orange-ginger apple sauce.

13.title: Flawless Flavor
13.plot: Stuffed Belgian endives and green salad with roasted pears and blue cheese are prepared.

1.title: Italian Inspiration
1.plot: The fresh flavors of the Italian coast inspire recipes for mascarpone crostini topped with roasted bell peppers and pickled shallots; fresh Mediterranean pasta with salsa cruda; and individual tiramisus.

2.title: Deep Sea Savings
2.plot: Mussels in white-wine-and-fennel broth, served with French bread and berry Pavlovas.

3.title: Footloose & Fancy-Free
3.plot: Homemade falafel, served with white-bean yogurt sauce and couscous tabouli.

4.title: Dreamin' of Tagine
4.plot: A Moroccan meal, featuring chilled carrot-and-cauliflower soup; chicken tagine; and couscous with peas and mint.

5.title: Taking on Tex-Mex
5.plot: Tex-Mex favorites are made, including pork carnitas, pico de gallo, chocolate-cinnamon nachos.

6.title: Clay Pot Cooking
6.plot: Homemade fafafel with creamy white-bean yogurt sauce, served over a simple salad of lettuce, tomato and cucumber. Also prepared: couscous tabouli; Israeli couscous.

7.title: First-Rate Rouladen
7.plot: Beef rouladen is made, along with braised cabbage and creamy mashed potatoes.

8.title: Southwest Steak Supper
8.plot: Sirloin steak topped with poblano pesto, sweet-potato hash and non-alcoholic sangria are served.

9.title: Chic Chicken Dinner
9.plot: Roasted garlic chicken, served with ratatouille and crusty Parmesan bread.

10.title: Burger Bliss
10.plot: On the menu: burgers topped with basil sauce; wedge salad with grilled grape tomatoes and blue-cheese vinaigrette; fruit "sushi".

11.title: Make a Brunch, Save a Bunch
11.plot: A brunch menu, featuring scrambled eggs with fresh herb; green salad with Dijon vinaigrette; and a banana-yogurt-and-granola trifle.

12.title: Give Thanks for the Leftovers!
12.plot: Thanksgiving leftovers are transformed into turkey pad Thai; chocolate-yam marble cake; and cranberry-orange spritzers.

13.title: Holiday Helpings
13.plot: Prepared: stuffed pork roast with sausage and apples; salt-roasted potatoes and green beans with grainy mustard; poached pears with chocolate-ganache sauce.

1.title: Chick, Chick, Ole
1.plot: Chicken fajitas on homemade tortillas and grilled-tomato salsa are made.

2.title: Appetizing Savings
2.plot: Appetizers are made, including white gazpacho; spicy turkey lollipops with a raspberry glaze; blue-cheese fondue; fried celery sticks.

3.title: Back in Tucson
3.plot: Melissa prepares dishes, inspired by her childhood in Tucson, including arroz con pollo; applesauce empanadas; iced green tea with fresh herbs and honey.

4.title: Healthy, Wealthy & Wise
4.plot: Greek salad with roasted salmon and mocha granitas are made.

5.title: Golden State Gourmet
5.plot: Roasted chicken is served with tomatillo-chile sauce and Asian coleslaw.

6.title: Little Helpers, Big Brunch
6.plot: Melissa's daughters help her whip up a weekend brunch menu. Included: chocolate pancakes filled with veggies; baked eggs with chorizo and cream; green smoothies.

7.title: Diner on a Dime
7.plot: Grilled-cheese sandwiches, asparagus soup and banana splits complete a diner-inspired menu.

8.title: Swine and Dine
8.plot: Southern dished are prepared. Included: BBQ-pulled-pork sandwiches; sweet-potato-and-bacon tots with mustard dipping sauce; and caramelized-banana shakes.

9.title: Chicken Italiano
9.plot: Italian-American recipes are prepared, including fritto misto; Italian marinated chicken with red potatoes; orange-basil biscotti.

10.title: Catch of the Day Cookout
10.plot: Prepared: citrus tilapia en papillote, served over baby spinach and topped with grilled summer relish. Also: grilled pound cake with grilled peaches and an orange-scented cream-cheese glaze.

11.title: Saving Quarters in the French Quarter
11.plot: Shrimp-and-tilapia po-boys, mint-and-celery salad, and coffee pudding complete a New Orleans-inspired meal.

12.title: Ten Dollar Game Day
12.plot: A budget-friendly tailgate menu, featuring grilled spicy sausages with onion marmalade and tomato chutney; yellow cakes in a jar with chocolate ganache; and ginger lemonade.

13.title: Seafood and Sweets
13.plot: A seafood meal of flounder and shrimp in a white wine-tomato sauce is prepared. Also: romaine salad dressed with a Parmesan vinaigrette; and orange-chocolate lava cakes for dessert.

imdb.title: Ten Dollar Dinners
plot: Recipes for four, that cost under $10 to prepare, are provided.::anonymous
